name: My Best Friends - Cats & Dogs
description: You are responsible for the sensitive upbringing of your pet: You decide on the food, the composition of training courses, the grooming and decorating.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 3D compatible graphic card with 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is an absolute piece of utter crap, I've played bad pet simulator games in my life, but I have never seen one this horrible. The graphics are ugly and look like they came out of a Nintendo 64, it's impossible to keep your pet's needs satisfied and the game is endlessly repetitive. I strongly recommend you skip this game and find a better one to play.
Friends and family are nowhere near as important and swagging w/ my dog 'meal'. My one complaint is that my dog is one money sucking son-of-a-♥♥♥♥♥.
